CustomField.formula: IF(TODAY()- LastActivityDate <= 60, 4, IF(AND(TODAY()- LastActivityDate <= 90, TODAY()- LastActivityDate > 60), 3, IF(AND(TODAY()- LastActivityDate <= 180, TODAY()- LastActivityDate > 90), 2, IF(AND(TODAY()- LastActivityDate <= 365, TODAY()- LastActivityDate > 180), 1, IF(TODAY()- LastActivityDate > 365, 0.5, 0)))))
CustomField.label: ADA
